Years ago, me and my sister bought portal 2 for the xbox 360 and beat the co-op missions together, but I realized with all the fun we had years ago, I never beat the single player missions. well, 10 or so years later, I finally fixed that. what a great game! don't google hints! it ruins the game. just play and be stuck at your own pace.

엔딩볼때 이제 트릭을 안깨도 되는구나 라는 생각만 들었다.
스토리와 트릭비중이 포탈1에서랑은 다르게 트릭에 너무 치중되있는것 같다.
트릭을 위해 스토리를 만들었다는 맹목적인 느낌만 플레이 내내 들게 만들었다.
Fun singleplayer and even better co-op. With steam workshop, you have a practically infinite supply of levels at your fingertips.
its like that one gun from terraria that makes the portals

Portal 2, what a game.

Graphics are absolutely beautiful despite being created all the way back in 2011.
Story line is really unique and interesting, allowing players to have a refreshing experience from portal 1.
To add on, co-op is a really nice addition which made my experience more enjoyable.

In conclusion, should you buy it? Absolutely. It's worth investing time on this game and to even attempt completing achievements.

Obra de arte

Genial e único são as palavras que podem definir este jogo com puzzles, narrativas e personagens incríveis. Sem dúvidas, um dos melhores jogos que já joguei em toda a minha vida.
Portal 2 is a much longer and more polished product than its predecessor. It has a co-op mode, and has a somewhat good storyline.

o 1 é maravilhoso, o 2 é melhor que o 1

This and Portal 1 are still the best puzzle games ever made. I'm no good at writing reviews, let alone concise ones, so I'll just say buy it. It's worth playing.

Single player kısmı da co-op kısmı da aşırı iyi. Oyunun haritaları hiçbir zaman birbirinin aynısı gibi hissettirmiyor. Oyuna yer yer kullanmanız gereken yeni mekanikler ekleniyor. GLaDOS'un güzel bir mizah anlayışı var. Co-op oynarken de robotlar arasında komik ve eğlenceli görüntüler çıkabiliyor. İster single player ister co-op eğer oynamadıysanız kesinlikle oynayın.

Edit: Portal Reloaded diye bir oyun çıktı portal 2'ye sahipseniz bir göz atın derim. Diğer modlara da bakabilirsiniz.(Fan yapımı modlar)

I heard that this game is great so I bought it and I LOVED IT! If you liked Portal 1 or puzzle games in general this is the game for you! The characters are funny the puzzles make you feel smart and best of all EVERYTHING ELSE!!! So give this game a try and I am sure you will love it!

отличная игра, хороший сюжет, и по моему это первая игра где придумали использовать порталы, и не только придумали эту идею так и воплотили её, вот только печально что 3 части нету и не будет

Nice sequel with a lot of emphasis on the plot and added mechanics, however I prefer the original because it is slower and does not linger, this is welcome since I feel like this game is in the second half. I'm not a big fan of puzzles, so it's hard for me to rate this game highly, but I totally understand why others are doing it. I will say that this game seems more memorable than the original, with its sequences, puzzles, characters, dialogue and especially the ending. In general, if you love puzzles, this game is just a must to play.
9/10 (Good)
